Source.Name: wol
Source.Description: This is wol, the Wake On Lan client. It wakes up magic packet compliant machines such as boxes with wake-on-lan ethernet-cards. Some workstations provides SecureON which extends wake-on-lan with a password. This feature is also provided by wol.

Package.Name: wol
Package.Description: This is wol, the Wake On Lan client. It wakes up magic packet compliant machines such as boxes with wake-on-lan ethernet-cards. Some workstations provides SecureON which extends wake-on-lan with a password. This feature is also provided by wol.
